## IStyleable interface

Interface for an object that a style can be added to.  Blockly.IStyleable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IStyleable 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addStyle(style)](./blockly.istyleable.addstyle.md) | Adds a style on the toolbox. Usually used to change the cursor. |
|  [removeStyle(style)](./blockly.istyleable.removestyle.md) | Removes a style from the toolbox. Usually used to change the cursor. |
